title: Eke daya bAradO
sahitya:
Eke daya bAradO lOkanAyaka ninagEke


caraNam 1    indirEsha nimma pAda dvandvava nambidenayya bandu salaho bEgadinda nandagOpana kanda ninage
    caraNam 2    shrSTiyoLage ninage eLLaSTu karuNa bAradEko siTTEko enna mEle muSTika mardana krSNa ninage
    caraNam 3    aStama strIyara patiye enna kaSTava parihariso munna bennasi beTTavanentida diTTa shRi gOpAla ninage
    caraNam 4    vAsuki shayana enna dOSava parihariso innu dAsyavittu nODo anjanAdrIsha shrInivAsa ninage
    caraNam 5    aravaindAkSa nIne enage saruva baLaga bandhu bhAgya ariya parAkramava bEge purandara viTTala ninage
